"Please come and visit us ... you know my brave boy . . . been together out there . . . both playing the hero . . . Ah, Vasfli Igndtovich . . . How d'ye do, old fellow?" he said, turning to an old man who was passing, but before he had finished his greeting there was a general stir, and a footman who had run in announc
